entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 this morning then light this afternoon. High 16. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023
